Query.name: ServiceType
Query.Sql: select Id, Description, IsActive, CreatedDate, UpdatedDate from ServiceType

Query.name: State
Query.Sql: select Id, State_Name, State_Code, CountryId, CreatedDate, UpdatedDate from State

Query.name: SCF
Query.Sql: select Id, SCF_Code, City_Name, DisplayText, StateId, IsActive, CreatedDate, UpdatedDate from SCF

Query.name: Service
Query.Sql: select s.Id as ServiceId, s.ServiceTypeId, s.Tilte, s.ShortDescription, s.LongDescription, s.URL, s.PartnerPromoCode, s.CreatedDate, s.StartDate, s.EndDate, s.IsActive, s.CustomField1, s.CustomField2, s.CustomField3, s.MakeLive, s.IconImage, s.SliderImage, s.UpdatedDate, s.UpdatedUser, [LastExtractedDate], InAppPurchaseID, [PurchasePrice], [ServiceStatusAPIAvailable], 'False' DisableAPIAvailable, ThirdPartyAPI from [Service] s

Query.name: ServiceZipCode
Query.Sql: select sz.Id as ServiceId, sz.ZipCodes from [Service] sz where isnull(sz.ZipCodes,'') != ''

Query.name: Product
Query.Sql: select Id, Name, ProductCategoryId, IsActive, CreatedDate, UpdatedDate from Product

Query.name: ProductCategory
Query.Sql: select Id, Name, IsActive, CreatedDate, UpdatedDate from ProductCategory

Query.name: ServiceProduct
Query.Sql: select Id, ServiceId,ProductId from ServiceProduct order by Id
